I hope this will help the newcomers.(excuse me who already knows this process)Step-1Step-2Step-3Step-4Step-5: All set , go to you Profile you will see the signature in your porfile edited-Here is some necessary info:Quote from: theymos on February 26, 2014, 09:15:18 PMPerhaps the allowed signature styling should change with activity score / membergroup. Like:- Newbie: No styling (including links) allowed. Max 40 characters.- Jr. Member: Links allowed. Max 100 characters.- Member: Unlimited length.- Full: Color allowed.- Sr. Member: Size allowed- Hero: Background color allowed
